chunks.text: Letters from Assyrian and Babylonian Scholars

The text editions from the book S. Parpola, Letters from Assyrian and Babylonian Scholars (State Archives of Assyria, 10), 1993 (2014 reprint). Buy the book from  Eisenbrauns  [http://www.eisenbrauns.com/item/PARLETTER] .
You can view the project's content  here  [/saao/saa10/pager] .
